      • onTransactionSet

        public B onTransactionSet(RITransactionSet set)

      • onTransactionSet

        public B onTransactionSet(ValueGenerator<? extends RITransactionSet> set)
        Sets the TransactionSet on this transaction, and also links the transactionset to this transaction's claim. If the transactionset does not already have a claim, its claim will be set to the transaction's claim. If multiple TransactionBuilders call onTransactionSet() on the same transactionset, only the first such call will set the claim on the transactionset (if it did not already have one).
        Parameters:
        set - the TransactionSet to link this transaction to
        Returns:
        TransactionBuilder with its TransactionSet set
